checkEmailTitle: An email has been sent to you!
checkEmailSecondSection: Please check your-email and confirm moneto's request to set up the account. Just to be sure, please also check your spam folder.
checkEmailThirdSection: Security is a top priority for us. With e-mail verification you ensure that your account is linked to your e-mail address.
checkEmailFourthSection: You can now close this page!
passwordStrengthTips: Password should consist of eight or more characters and should include at least one lower case letter, one capital letter and one number.

validators.newPasswordValidator: The field :attribute must consist of at least eight characters and must include at least one lower case letter, one capital letter and one number
validators.newPasswordConfirmationValidator: The field :attribute must agree with the password

notifications.correctMistakes: Please correct the mistakes in the text fields
notifications.UnknownUser: The activation link is incomplete or is no longer valid
notifications.IncorrectUnlocker: The activation link is incomplete or is no longer valid
notifications.UserDoesntExist: No user with this e-mail address exists.
